Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       You act as if I was going to die very soon, Code, or perhaps you have 
some killing fantasy of your own? Who knows. But isnt it really funny how 
everyone get this Holyer-than-thou atitude when something like this arises? 
Do anyone of you think that any of us actual care? I dont. This is just some 
oppertunity for your faceless screen names to stand up and make some stupid 
and miniscule point before disappearing back into the mailing list. And if 
youre wondering, Im not going to apologize. So, how bout we all go back to 
the game, forget about the ever so tragic fate of our commrad, and move on. 
Personally, I dont care about the insults and have a really good time 
laughing at them, but we ought to keep the RPG going. 

(...And have a good life, when you die we will ridicule you, remember
that we will treat you how you treated minime, got that?...)



       Megatron, Rampage, and Marine treked behinde Scorpinox, heading towrds 
his boss who held the mysterious golden disk.

--part1_95.66d5bb0.27ada6dc_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
